name: S2019 Gravity
description:
Gravity is an adventure, puzzle platformer where you play as a wizard whose village is attacked by an evil sorcerer! In this game you must complete a series of puzzles based around your enchanted boots, which allow you to control the effects of gravity on objects, to first drive the evil sorcerer away and then defeat him for good! 

Instructions:

  • Use A and D to move left and right
  • Use the arrow keys to control the effects of gravity on crates
  • Use E to activate switches
  • Use F to fire your magic staff (once you acquire this item)
  • Pressure pads are activated by either the weight of a crate or the weight of the player
  • The goal of the game is to complete every level and to defeat the evil sorcerer
